update.description:
Prototype solution to Issue #23: Coordinate the physics and visualization of the wave field.

**Dependencies:**

Checkout the branch of asv\_wave\_sim with support for VRX:

```shell
cd ~/vrx_ws/src
git clone https://github.com/srmainwaring/asv_wave_sim.git
cd asv_wave_sim
git checkout feature/vrx
```

‌

**Build:**

A catkin tools build should complete clean without needing to install further dependencies:

```shell
cd ~/vrx_ws
catkin build
source ./devel/setup.bash
```

‌

**Run:**

Launch the sandisland demo:

```
roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch verbose:=true
```

‌

**Publish wave parameters:**

The following establishes a small amplitude wave field:

```
./devel/lib/asv_wave_sim_gazebo_plugins/WaveMsgPublisher \
  --number 3 \
  --scale 2 \
  --angle 0.4 \
  --direction -1 -1 \
  --steepness 1 \
  --period 7 \
  --amplitude .1
```
update.title: Issue #23: Coordinate the physics and visualization of the wave field

pull_request.title: Issue #23: Coordinate the physics and visualization of the wave field
